name: Lantern Quest
description:
This prototype is based of pacifism mode in geometry wars, I wanted to see If I could pull it off in a day with an online leader board. I'm very happy with how it turned out, all up it took around 7 hours.

Try and beat my high score :)

Timelapse video of the 1 day jam

Controls
-W,A,S,D to move
-Press Enter after writing your name

Follow me on Twitter
Follow me on YouTube
